verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6602>Pethuel.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> you <S%H2205>old<s%> men, and give <S%H238>ear,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Has <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1961>been<s%> in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> or <S%H518>even<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers?<s%>

<S%H5608>Tell<s%> you your <S%H1121>children<s%> of it, and let your <S%H1121>children<s%> tell their <S%H1121>children,<s%> and their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

That which the <S%H1501>palmerworm<s%> has <S%H3499>left<s%> has the <S%H697>locust<s%> <S%H398>eaten;<s%> and that which the <S%H697>locust<s%> has <S%H3499>left<s%> has the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%> <S%H398>eaten;<s%> and that which the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%> has <S%H3499>left<s%> has the <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%> <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

<S%H6974>Awake,<s%> you <S%H7910>drunkards,<s%> and <S%H1058>weep;<s%> and <S%H3213>howl,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H8354>drinkers<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the new <S%H6071>wine;<s%> for it is <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

For a <S%H1471>nation<s%> is <S%H5927>come<s%> up on my <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6099>strong,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%> whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and he has the <S%H4973>cheek<s%> <S%H4973>teeth<s%> of a <S%H3833>great<s%> <S%H3833>lion.<s%>

He has <S%H7760>laid<s%> my <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H8047>waste,<s%> and <S%H7111>barked<s%> my <S%H8384>fig<s%> tree: he has made it clean <S%H2834>bore,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it away; the <S%H8299>branches<s%> thereof are made <S%H3835>white.<s%>
<S%H421>Lament<s%> like a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H2296>girded<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> for the <S%H1167>husband<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

The meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering is <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H8334>ministers,<s%> <S%H56>mourn.<s%>

The <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H7703>wasted,<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H56>mourns;<s%> for the <S%H1715>corn<s%> is <S%H7703>wasted:<s%> the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> is <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, the <S%H3323>oil<s%> <S%H535>languishes.<s%>

Be you <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> O you <S%H406>farmers;<s%> <S%H3213>howl,<s%> O you <S%H3755>vinedressers,<s%> for the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and for the <S%H8184>barley;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H6>perished.<s%>

The <S%H1612>vine<s%> is <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, and the <S%H8384>fig<s%> tree <S%H535>languishes;<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> tree, the <S%H8558>palm<s%> tree <S%H1571>also,<s%> and the <S%H8598>apple<s%> tree, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> are <S%H3001>withered:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> is <S%H3001>withered<s%> away from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

<S%H2296>Gird<s%> yourselves, and <S%H5594>lament,<s%> you <S%H3548>priests:<s%> <S%H3213>howl,<s%> you <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H3885>lie<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night in <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> you <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of my <S%H430>God:<s%> for the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering is <S%H4513>withheld<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> you a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> a <S%H6116>solemn<s%> <S%H6116>assembly,<s%> <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

<S%H162>Alas<s%> for the <S%H3117>day!<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7138>at<s%> <S%H7138>hand,<s%> and as a <S%H7701>destruction<s%> from the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> shall it <S%H935>come.<s%>
Is not the <S%H400>meat<s%> <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H5048>before<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> yes, <S%H8057>joy<s%> and <S%H1524>gladness<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God?<s%>

The <S%H6507>seed<s%> is <S%H5685>rotten<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H4053>clods,<s%> the <S%H214>garners<s%> are laid <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> the <S%H4460>barns<s%> are <S%H2040>broken<s%> <S%H2040>down;<s%> for the <S%H1715>corn<s%> is <S%H3001>withered.<s%>

<S%H4100>How<s%> do the <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H584>groan!<s%> the <S%H5739>herds<s%> of <S%H1241>cattle<s%> are <S%H943>perplexed,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4829>pasture;<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> are made <S%H816>desolate.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to you will I <S%H7121>cry:<s%> for the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and the <S%H3852>flame<s%> has <S%H3857>burned<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

The <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H6165>cry<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to you: for the <S%H650>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, and the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
